name: WatchCityWeather
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: watch city weather
des:
You can check the latest weather information around the world cities. A screen attached device is required to use this skill.

Specify a city and a data item. 
Data Items are follows: weather, clouds, humidity, temperature, wind speed, pressure, sunrise, sunset, timezone.
The results of the last 5 searches are displayed on the screen.
(Caution) You cannot specify both at a same time. Specify either at a time

1. Specify the data item
- What is the weather
- The humidity
- The item is humidity

2. Specify a city
- The city is London
- London

3. Reset search results
- Reset

Open weather API (https://openweathermap.org/) used. Number of city locations are over 200,000.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
